comments.body: MrMiner has successfully added GainProX (GPRX)Join now!Fees SOLO 0.5% PROP 0% (Event until Tuesday)Min Payout: 0.5 GPRXDIscord: https://discord.gg/CAsyyqFpjQWebsite Solo Pool: https://mr-miner.org/#gainproxMiner command line Solo Pool:-a x11 -o stratum+tcp://gprx.mr-miner.org:1221 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p x  Website Prop Pool: https://prop.mr-miner.org/#gainproxMiner command line Prop Pool:-a x11 -o stratum+tcp://gprx.mr-miner.org:4111 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p x Cheers!

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added GainProX (GPRX) to http://zpool.ca/algo/ghostrider. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine ghostrider and get paid in GPRX:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u GPRX_ADDRESS -p c=GPRX Exchange to BTC:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for ghostrider: 55354==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_
